title: The declaration of the navie, being the true copie of a letter from the officers of the navie, to the commissioners vvith their resolutions upon turning out Colonell Rainsbrough from being their commander. 28th. May, 1648.
author: Lisle, George, Sir, d. 1648.
notes: Signed at end: Thomas Lisle [and 8 others, plus the "Captaine of the Roebuck, Hinde, and severall other Officers of these and other Ships."].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
